name: Deadly Days
description: "Deadly Days" is the unique strategic zombie survival rogue-lite. Manage and protect a group of survivors and help them find a cure. Discover and use a wide variety of crazy items, special abilities and lethal weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz, 64bit Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with Shader Model 3, 512MB VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
